00028 #ifndef V8_V8_DEBUG_H_
00029 #define V8_V8_DEBUG_H_
00030 
00031 #include "v8.h"
00032 
00033 #ifdef _WIN32
00034 typedef int int32_t;
00035 typedef unsigned int uint32_t;
00036 typedef unsigned short uint16_t;  // NOLINT
00037 typedef long long int64_t;  // NOLINT
00038 
00039 // Setup for Windows DLL export/import. See v8.h in this directory for
00040 // information on how to build/use V8 as a DLL.
00041 #if defined(BUILDING_V8_SHARED) && defined(USING_V8_SHARED)
00042 #error both BUILDING_V8_SHARED and USING_V8_SHARED are set - please check the\
00043   build configuration to ensure that at most one of these is set
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #ifdef BUILDING_V8_SHARED
00047 #define EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00048 #elif USING_V8_SHARED
00049 #define EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00050 #else
00051 #define EXPORT
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #else  // _WIN32
00055 
00056 // Setup for Linux shared library export. See v8.h in this directory for
00057 // information on how to build/use V8 as shared library.
00058 #if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4) && defined(V8_SHARED)
00059 #define EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00060 #else  // defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4)
00061 #define EXPORT
00062 #endif  // defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 4)
00063 
00064 #endif  // _WIN32
00065 
00066 
00070 namespace v8 {
00071 
00072 // Debug events which can occur in the V8 JavaScript engine.
00073 enum DebugEvent {
00074   Break = 1,
00075   Exception = 2,
00076   NewFunction = 3,
00077   BeforeCompile = 4,
00078   AfterCompile  = 5,
00079   ScriptCollected = 6
00080 };
00081 
00082 
00083 class EXPORT Debug {
00084  public:
00089   class ClientData {
00090    public:
00091     virtual ~ClientData() {}
00092   };
00093 
00094 
00098   class Message {
00099    public:
00103     virtual bool IsEvent() const = 0;
00104     virtual bool IsResponse() const = 0;
00105     virtual DebugEvent GetEvent() const = 0;
00106 
00111     virtual bool WillStartRunning() const = 0;
00112 
00118     virtual Handle<Object> GetExecutionState() const = 0;
00119     virtual Handle<Object> GetEventData() const = 0;
00120 
00124     virtual Handle<String> GetJSON() const = 0;
00125 
00131     virtual Handle<Context> GetEventContext() const = 0;
00132 
00140     virtual ClientData* GetClientData() const = 0;
00141 
00142     virtual ~Message() {}
00143   };
00144   
00145 
00149   class EventDetails {
00150    public:
00154     virtual DebugEvent GetEvent() const = 0;
00155 
00160     virtual Handle<Object> GetExecutionState() const = 0;
00161     virtual Handle<Object> GetEventData() const = 0;
00162 
00168     virtual Handle<Context> GetEventContext() const = 0;
00169 
00173     virtual Handle<Value> GetCallbackData() const = 0;
00174 
00175     virtual ~EventDetails() {}
00176   };
00177 
00178 
00188   typedef void (*EventCallback)(DebugEvent event,
00189                                 Handle<Object> exec_state,
00190                                 Handle<Object> event_data,
00191                                 Handle<Value> data);
00192 
00201   typedef void (*EventCallback2)(const EventDetails& event_details);
00202 
00215   typedef void (*MessageHandler)(const uint16_t* message, int length,
00216                                  ClientData* client_data);
00217 
00226   typedef void (*MessageHandler2)(const Message& message);
00227 
00231   typedef void (*HostDispatchHandler)();
00232 
00236   typedef void (*DebugMessageDispatchHandler)();
00237 
00238   // Set a C debug event listener.
00239   static bool SetDebugEventListener(EventCallback that,
00240                                     Handle<Value> data = Handle<Value>());
00241   static bool SetDebugEventListener2(EventCallback2 that,
00242                                      Handle<Value> data = Handle<Value>());
00243 
00244   // Set a JavaScript debug event listener.
00245   static bool SetDebugEventListener(v8::Handle<v8::Object> that,
00246                                     Handle<Value> data = Handle<Value>());
00247 
00248   // Break execution of JavaScript.
00249   static void DebugBreak();
00250 
00251   // Message based interface. The message protocol is JSON. NOTE the message
00252   // handler thread is not supported any more parameter must be false.
00253   static void SetMessageHandler(MessageHandler handler,
00254                                 bool message_handler_thread = false);
00255   static void SetMessageHandler2(MessageHandler2 handler);
00256   static void SendCommand(const uint16_t* command, int length,
00257                           ClientData* client_data = NULL);
00258 
00259   // Dispatch interface.
00260   static void SetHostDispatchHandler(HostDispatchHandler handler,
00261                                      int period = 100);
00262 
00274   static void SetDebugMessageDispatchHandler(
00275       DebugMessageDispatchHandler handler, bool provide_locker = false);
00276 
00295   static Local<Value> Call(v8::Handle<v8::Function> fun,
00296                             Handle<Value> data = Handle<Value>());
00297 
00301   static Local<Value> GetMirror(v8::Handle<v8::Value> obj);
00302 
00311   static bool EnableAgent(const char* name, int port,
00312                           bool wait_for_connection = false);

00349   static void ProcessDebugMessages();
00350 
00357   static Local<Context> GetDebugContext();
00358 };
